reviewText:
This is one of, if not the, best Playboy presentations that I've ever seen. I really can't say anything negative except that they never shot a couple of the models from the back. But for Playboy, which too often ignores that side, we get a whole lot of booty and boy oh boy most of it is off the charts.

I also was surprised to hear the shoot director say at the beginning that they were looking for women with natural bodies, because as most of us are aware, Playboy hasn't been known for that for at least the last decade. Well, he said it, and apparently he meant it, because the vast majority of these women--and there are tons and tons of them, about 50 in all even given the DVD's short duration--don't have implants. Of the ones who do, most of them clearly had good surgeons.

And it's not as if you're getting all-natural girls with nothing to show in the chestal area, either...the overwhelming majority of these women have superior breasts and some downright immeasurably phenomenal. That can't be said for a lot of other releases of this genre, Playboy or otherwise.

Also the pacing is good...I tend to get bored when seeing one model in essentially the same poses over and over again, in a lot of dark lighting, etc. None of that here. Do the math--you know that if there are 50 girls in 60 minutes, none of them is on screen for long. Yet we see basically everything that we want to see (yes, even some explicit nudity), and everything is brilliantly lit. No scrubbing, no digital enhancement, no retouching. Just these incredibly-gorgeous women showing everything that they have for the cameras, without the safety net of quick cuts or other techniques that might cheat to make them look better than they really do.

Buy, buy, buy.

THIS IS AN EXCELLENT DVD, THE GIRLS ARE VERY PRETTY AND MOST OF THEM LOOK NATURAL, NO IMPLANTS ETC, IF YOU LIKE NATURAL GIRLS WITH FULL NUDITY YOU WILL ENJOY THIS ONE
  RAZORBACK FAN

I ordered this vid with another (which I would rather forget). I was disappointed with the other one, but this vid from Playboy was pretty great. It's nothing but amateur girls trying to get into playboy. The video and camera work is amateur as well, but that's not a knock against the vid, it's actually a plus because they get it right. High quality video cameras are used (digital?) for great clarity, but they retain that amateur camcorder feel. This vid's strength lies in it's use of amateur girls and the sheer quantity they use. There are tons of girls in this vid, from all over the country. Blondes, brunettes, ethnic girls, fitness girls, busty girls (real and fake), they're all here! Each girl is only shown for a few minutes, so each scene is brief, but that allows for more girls, and that's a good thing. Each tryout starts with the girl removing all her clothing and posing for the camera, that's it, but it's very effective. Conversations and natural sounds are left in, so we learn that some of these girls are posing for the first time, which is exciting! My only complaint is that there are very few shots down south and the ones we get are quick, but playboy rarely gives us much in that department any way, so it's no real surprise. I was hoping with an amateur vid like this that they would have went for it, but no. Still, a great vid and a must for any amateur vid fan.

and remove your clothes. This is what it is- tryouts for Playboy. Now that Playboy is on the web as well as in print, that creates a big need for models. Not like the olde days where "only 12 women a year" get into Playboy. This DVD shows what goes in a typical tryouts. If you like variety and no long winded speeches on how "posing nude made me more mature", then this DVD is a good buy.
